title: PM Narendra Modi hosts prominent Sikhs; they hail him as a 'Sikh at heart' - The Tribune India
content:
1. PM Narendra Modi hosts prominent Sikhs; they hail him as a 'Sikh at heart'  The Tribune India
  2. 'Nothing to do with polls,' insists BJP leader as Modi meets Sikh delegation  Hindustan Times
  3. PM Big Sikh Outreach Ahead Of Punjab Polls, Modi Hosts Prominent Sikh Leaders At His Residence  India Today
  4. PM Narendra Modi hosts prominent Sikhs in ‘apolitical meeting’ at his official residence  Times Now
  5. PM hosts prominent Sikhs from across India at his residence  IndianExpressOnline
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday hosted prominent Sikhs from across India at his 7 Lok Kalyan Marg residence here and hailed the contributions of the community to national integrity and prosperity.
